summary: This is an email from an individual to a contractor at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, requesting a call to discuss the responsiveness review of search warrant returns related to the Epstein case on the Relativity platform.

persons.name: IM (USANYS) [Contractor]
persons.role: Contractor at U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Recipient of an email regarding scheduling a call to discuss the Epstein search warrant responsiveness review.

events.title: Email Request for Epstein Review Call
events.description: An email is sent to a US Attorney's Office contractor to schedule a call to discuss the responsiveness review of Epstein search warrant returns.

keyFacts: An email was sent on October 11, 2020, regarding the Epstein case investigation.
The email concerns a 'responsiveness review' of 'Epstein SW returns' (likely search warrant returns) on the Relativity platform.
The communication is directed to a contractor at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
